title: FS: 1912 T202 Schaefer On First McBride/Milan/Shoeless Joe Jackson New PSA SOLD
author: Moonlight Graham

posts.post_title: FS: 1912 T202 Schaefer On First McBride/Milan/Shoeless Joe Jackson New PSA SOLD
posts.post_content:
Just a beautiful PSA 2.5 in a brand new holder. The price is SOLD PayPal friends/family please. Thanks for checking out my sale!

Joe K.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=618258&d=1713228986[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=618259&d=1713229001[/IMG]
Ole Joe sure does appear on a bunch of T202s...

[quote name="Moonlight Graham" post=2427249]How's this??

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=618407&d=1713313400[/IMG][/QUOTE]

The bottom one has been confirmed by other photos taken at the same time as being Joe.  However, the top one shows a much stockier Cleveland player IMO.

Both have been confirmed by the Shoeless Joe Jackson Museum.

Joe K
